parameters: \.Seems to be stocked with a lot of alcohol...
Oh, but, since you’re a minor, Sara...
you’re not allowed to have any!
is as good a reason as any, wouldn’t you agree?
\C[3]Professor Mishima's inspecting every inch of the room.
\.Please, let me know if I can assist you
\C[3]Professor Mishima's inspecting every inch of the room.
\.You’re not putting yourself in harm’s way, are you?
Please take utmost caution... Mwahaha... Yes...
A minor shouldn't be carrying around such a thing!
I thought it might be a clue for something...
\.Hm... It seems I slip into teaching mode
instinctively whenever I see a student.
Yes, it might be best if you let me hold onto that.
\.\C[4](I'm telling you I won't smoke it...)
\.\C[3]Handed the Cigar over to Professor Mishima.
\.Huh? Oh, you mean the cigar cutter?
\.Precisely! It's a tool used for smoking cigars.
\.That being said... you don't intend on smoking...
Are you... going to smoke the cigar?
Out of the question! My, my... For a teacher to
\.\C[4](As long as you're an adult, I think it's fine...)
\.\C[3]Handed the Cigar Cutter over to Professor Mishima.
\.Indeed. Did you find it while exploring?
Perhaps... you intend to light up a...
\.\C[3]Handed the Lighter over to Professor Mishima.
You seem awfully excited about something... don't you?
excitable about this situation in the slightest!
never perform such a disgraceful act such as\fi smoooking!
I want to inspect the cigar
Man... that cigar sure does look preeetty well made!
\.Hmmm... Thinking about it, this looks like something
you might never be able to find anywhere in Japan.
should just put it back where I found it...
\.WHAT IN THE WORLD DO YOU THINK YOU'RE SAYING?!
\.Oh, I know! Perhaps the first step we should take
I want to inspect the cigar
\.I wonder... Did they really provide this cigar just
to have as a luxury item?
\.Would you mind if I took a closer look?
\.\fi*sigh*\fi ...Yes... I suppose you make a fair point.
Let us try using the cutter on this cigar.
\.\C[3]Professor Mishima cuts it with a practiced hand.
\.\C[3]Amazingly, there was a bill inside the cigar.
Smoking is a terrible habit, after all.
\.Miss Sara, please take the unused lighter back.
As well as this 1,000 yen bill.
you will likely find more use for them than I will now.
\.\C[4](...So he did intend to use the lighter.)
Please depend on me anytime, Miss Sara.
\C[3]Gin is searching at a low eye-level.
There’s nothing but booze in here, meow...
And I hate my stupid drunk Dad, too, meow!
\.What is it? You're being really quiet, woof.
\.Hey, Gin! Once we get outta here,
we should all play together sometime!
\.Huh? Heheheh, yeah! Then I can beat you up in
all my video games 'til you beg for mercy! Woof!
\.Does your Dad have a bad drinking habit?
\.As the saying goes. You can drink all you want,
but, don’t get swallowed up yourself.
So, I can’t get too carried away.
\C[3]Gin is searching at a low eye-level.
飲んだくれのとーちゃんはもっと嫌いだニャン！」
道具の組み合わせってやってみたニャン？」
\.「手持ちの道具を合体させて
使えるようにすることだワン」
\.「そう言えば　最初の試練の時
オレも赤いカギを　じろじろ調べたっけな！
突破口が開けるかもしれないぜ！」
\.\C[4]（…手持ちの道具を調べてみるか…）
\.\C[3]Could probably combine this with another item.
\C[3]Stuck the Dart into the large hole in the center of
Can I fire the dart with this now?)
A tool for cutting a cigar to smoke it.
A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.
What's the large hold in the center for...?
\.\C[3]Could probably combine this with another item.
\C[3]Stuck the Dart into the large hole
in the center of the Revolver.
Can I fire the dart with this now?)
\C[3]Dummy bullets. I have 6. If you pull the trigger
with these, it'll only make a sound.
Can be loaded into a gun and fired. Extremely lethal.
\C[3]There's a bunch of names on the blackboard.
Alice, Kai, Kazumi, Keiji, Shunsuke, Sou,
Anzu, Kanna, Gin, Kugie, Sara, Joe, Nao,
\.\C[4](Our names...! And some strangers' names, too!)
\.\C[4](Don't tell me... The people who we haven't seen
\C[3]There's a bunch of names on the blackboard.
Alice, Kai, Kazumi, Keiji, Shunsuke, Sou,
Anzu, Kanna, Gin, Kugie, Sara, Joe, Nao,

\C[3]I feel there's something on the side of the counter...
Move stool out of the way

\C[3]There's a sliding door on the side of the counter.
I’m too weak... \|\|\.\.I doubt I can open this.
\.Hey! Maybe there's a clue in there!
\.\C[3]Joe stuck his hand into the darkness.
\.I think I saw this online somewhere...
It's a tool for cutting cigars so you can light them.
\.Uh huh... And why the hell were you looking up
something like that online? Smoking's bad, Sara!
There's something bigger in the back! ...Let's see...
\.Okay, you're way too calm about this.
